en: I have to go to a movie
You should do me a favour.
hi: तुम्हे मेरी एक मदद करनी चाहिए।

en: There is Telugu film in Gayatri talkies.
hi: गायत्री टॉकीज में तॆलुगु फ़िल्म है।

en: I have to go to that cinema.
hi: मुझे उस सिनेमा में जाना है।

en: You should also come with me.
hi: तुम्हें भी मेरे साथ आना चाहिए।

en: I have to speak with the teacher.
I have to take a book (from him).
There are some more things to do.
I have to go to Rama's house.
I have to see her father.
I have to talk to him.
I have also to see Rama's brother.
hi: रमा के भाई को भी देखना है।

en: I have to do them today itself.
I have to bring their dog here.
hi: मुझे उनके कुत्ते को इधर लाना है।

en: You also come with me, don't worry.
hi: तुम भी आओ। चिंता मत करो।

en: It's not possible for me; you can go.
hi: मुझे मुमकिन नहीं है; तुम जाओ।

en: First let's go to the mess.
We have to eat food, isn't it?
Today we have only few chapathies, sir.
hi: आज चपातियाँ कुछ ही हैं जी।

en: I am not concerned with that.

te: నాకు రోజుకు కనీసం పది చపాతీలు కావాలి; తీసుకురా!
en: I need at least ten chapathies a day; bring them!
hi: मुझे रोज़ कम-से-कम दस चपातियाँ चाहिये; लाओ!

en: Will three chapathies be sufficient for you?
hi: तुम्हें तीन चपातियाँ काफ़ी हैं क्या?

te: నీ చపాతీలు ఒకటి కూడా నాకు అక్కర్లేదు.
en: I don't need any of your chapaties.
hi: तुम्हारी एक भी चपाती मुझे नहीं चाहिए।

en: Then go, and ask the secretary only.
hi: तो जाओ, secretary को ही पूछो।

en: I don't want if it is three chapathies.
hi: तीन चपातियाँ हैं तो मुझे नहीं चाहिए।

en: chapātī, a pan cake made of wheat flour
